name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Results-driven Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience specializing in delivering high-performance software solutions. Proficient in **.NET Core**, **.NET Framework**, **C#**, **MS SQL Server**, **T-SQL**, **Angular**, and **TypeScript**. Expert in developing secure and scalable web services and **REST APIs** with a strong foundation in **Microservices** architecture. Experienced in deploying cloud-native applications on **Azure**, utilizing **App Services**, **Azure SQL**, and **Azure Functions** to create robust solutions. Well-versed in CI/CD practices and **DevOps** methodologies to enhance development efficiency. 

Brings hands-on experience in modern **JavaScript** frameworks including **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**, alongside backend expertise in **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Proven track record in leading projects that incorporate AI/ML capabilities, enhancing real-time analytics and automation. Demonstrated strong problem-solving skills, attention to detail, and effective communication, with a commitment to building compliant and maintainable applications.
